Title: A Home Cooked Meal
Description:
Home-cooked stew. There is nothing like it in the world. 

I grant you, it might not be as tasty as the stew from the Empires Edge Inn. But it was cooked by family. That's what makes it great.

Join us. You have more than earned the right.
ObjectivesText: Have a meal at the Steelstrike House in Mereldar in Hallowfall.
CompletionText: It's been such a long time since I had a meal with the entire family.
RewardText:
Ah, I needed this.

You are welcome to join us anytime, $n.

Objectives.Text: Have a seat at the Steelstrike dinner table
